full_summary:
### ITQ: Post-Warranty Maintenance and Support Services for x86 HP Products

#### Issuing Authority
Shared Services Canada (SSC)

#### Request for Tender (RFT) Reference Numbers

* Solicitation Number: BPM018748/22598
* Amendment Number: Amendment 004
* SSC Reference Number: SSC-23-00022598:T

#### Tender Details

* **Title:** Post-warranty Hardware Maintenance and Support Services for x86 HP Products
* **Publication Date:** April 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 8, 2023 2:00 PM EDT
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Security Requirements:** This ITQ contains a requirement for vendor and personnel security screening
* **Infrastructure:** The infrastructure consists of server assets belonging to 45 partners supported by SSC
* **Services Required:** Post-warranty hardware maintenance and support services, including break and fix, for x86 HP products

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

Not provided

#### Contracting Entity

* **Name:** Shared Services Canada
* **Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Eric Lavigne
	+ Email: eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca
	+ Telephone: 343-541-8756
	+ Fax: 613-960-6026

#### Tender Documents and Supporting Information

To access the tender documents and supporting information, please visit the SSC P2P Portal website: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public) Under Solicitation List: BPM018748 Invitation to
